LanguageData.WordOfSerenity_PSY.label: Word of serenity
LanguageData.WordOfSerenity_PSY.description: Use calming words and psyhic suggestion to end a mental break on a person or animal. The target will fall into a short psyhic sleep. The psyfocus cost depends on the intensity of the target's mental break.
LanguageData.WordOfTrust_PSY.label: Word of trust
LanguageData.WordOfTrust_PSY.description: Speak to the prisoner while using psyhic suggestion to reduce their resistance to recruitment. This can only reduce a prisoner's resistance, but cannot recruit them.
LanguageData.Stun_PSY.label: Stun
LanguageData.Stun_PSY.description: Momentarily disrupt motor function in the target's brain, preventing any movement.
LanguageData.Focus_PSY.label: Focus
LanguageData.Focus_PSY.description: Psychically focus the target's mind, boosting their sight, hearing and moving capacities.
LanguageData.BlindingPulse_PSY.label: Blinding pulse
LanguageData.BlindingPulse_PSY.description: Induce noise in the visual centers of the brain, obscuring vision of everyone near the target point.
LanguageData.LongjumpFoot.label: Long jump
LanguageData.LongjumpFoot.description: Allows to jump over 10 meters. But kinda unstable, so be accurate with it.
